item.title: Weekly Unix #2 - du
item.description: du = Disk Usage du summarizes the disk usage for files and folders. How to use du This will list size of all the files as well as folders in the current directory. The folders will be explored recursively. That means all the files in the folders will be listed as well. The above gets bit out of hand when you have lot of files. You won’t be able to figure out what is happening as lot of entries will go from your eyes.
